revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Mt Mortar |image = [[File:Mt Mortar.png|thumb]] |caption = A map of Mt Mortar. |tokens = 5,500 |location = On route 42, east of Ecruteak City. }} '''Mt Mortar''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Johto]]. It initially has 36 tiles arranged in a 6x6 square, including 6 chest tiles, 15 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 104,100 HP. The first time you clear this dungeon you will be awarded with a [[Fighting Egg|Fighting egg]].
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Rattata.png|40px]] Rattata || rowspan=2|[[File:PokéManiac.png|40px]] PokéManiac Miller || rowspan=2|[[File:Nidoking.png|40px]] Nidoking, [[File:Nidoqueen.png|40px]] Nidoqueen |- | [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat |- | [[File:Geodude.png|40px]] Geodude || rowspan=2|[[File:Super_Nerd.png|40px]] Super Nerd Markus || rowspan=2|[[File:Slowpoke.png|40px]] Slowpoke |- | [[File:Marill.png|40px]] Marill |- | [[File:Raticate.png|40px]] Raticate || rowspan=3|[[File:Super_Nerd.png|40px]] Super Nerd Hugh || rowspan=3|[[File:Seadra.png|40px]] Seadra |- | [[File:Golbat.png|40px]] Golbat |- | [[File:Graveler.png|40px]] Graveler |- |}
===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Tyrogue.png|40px]] '''Tyrogue*''' || <center>420,000 || rowspan=3|[[File:Black_Belt (male).png|40px]] Black Belt Kiyo || [[File:Hitmonlee.png|40px]] Hitmonlee, [[File:Hitmonchan.png|40px]] Hitmonchan || <center>210,000 |}
'''*Note: Must have cleared Mt Mortar once'''
